sourcesContent:
import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import star from "../../assets/star.svg"; import info from "../../assets/noun-info-3320837.svg"; export default function Detail({ movie, formattedGenres }) { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); const { id, rank, title, description, genres, ratings, ranking, year, imdb_id, imdb_url, image_url, director, writer, duration, age_certification, } = movie; return ( <>
{title}
{year}
Genre: {formattedGenres}
Director: {director}
{ratings}
); }
